blocks.name: pmatring

blocks.name: pmatlmod

blocks.name: pmat0op
blocks.content: The zero polynomial matrix over a ring represented as operation. (Contributed by AV, 16-Nov-2019.)
blocks.origin:
thm pmat0op(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cfn), wcel(c1, crg)), wceq(cfv(c0g, c2), cmpo(s0, s1, c0, c0, c3)))
  -| wceq(c4, cfv(cpl1, c1))
  -| wceq(c2, co(c0, cmat, c4))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(c0g, c4))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c4)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c4)
} = {
  sylan2(wcel(c0, cfn), wcel(c1, crg), wceq(cfv(c0g, c2), cmpo(s0, s1, c0, c0, c3)), wcel(c4, crg))
  ply1ring(c1, c4)
  mat0op(s0, s1, c0, c4, c2, c3)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm pmat0op(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  ⊢ ((c0 ∈ Fin ∧ c1 ∈ Ring)→(0 ` c2)=(s0 ∈ c0, s1 ∈ c0 ↦ c3))
  ⊣ c4 =(Poly1 ` c1)
  ⊣ c2 =(c0[Mat]c4)
  ⊣ c3 =(0 ` c4)
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c4)
  ⊣ d(s1, c0)
  ⊣ d(s1, c4)
} = {
  sylan2(c0 ∈ Fin, c1 ∈ Ring, (0 ` c2)=(s0 ∈ c0, s1 ∈ c0 ↦ c3), c4 ∈ Ring)
  ply1ring(c1, c4)
  mat0op(s0, s1, c0, c4, c2, c3)
}

blocks.name: pmat1ovd
blocks.content: Entries of the identity polynomial matrix over a ring, deduction form. (Contributed by AV, 16-Nov-2019.)
blocks.origin:
thm pmat1ovd(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7, class c8, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(co(c0, c1, c2), cif(c3, c4, wceq(c0, c2))))
  -| wceq(c5, cfv(cpl1, c6))
  -| wceq(c7, co(c8, cmat, c5))
  -| wceq(c4, cfv(c0g, c5))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(cur, c5))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c8, cfn))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c6, crg))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, c8))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, c8))
  -| wceq(c1, cfv(cur, c7))
} = {
  mat1ov(c0, c1, c2, c3, c4, c7, c8, c5, w0)
  syl(w0, wcel(c5, crg), wcel(c6, crg))
  ply1ring(c6, c5)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm pmat1ovd(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7, class c8, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 →(c0[c1]c2)= if(c0 = c2, c3, c4))
  ⊣ c5 =(Poly1 ` c6)
  ⊣ c7 =(c8[Mat]c5)
  ⊣ c4 =(0 ` c5)
  ⊣ c3 =(1r ` c5)
  ⊣ (w0 → c8 ∈ Fin)
  ⊣ (w0 → c6 ∈ Ring)
  ⊣ (w0 → c0 ∈ c8)
  ⊣ (w0 → c2 ∈ c8)
  ⊣ c1 =(1r ` c7)
} = {
  mat1ov(c0, c1, c2, c3, c4, c7, c8, c5, w0)
  syl(w0, c5 ∈ Ring, c6 ∈ Ring)
  ply1ring(c6, c5)
}

blocks.name: pmat0opsc
blocks.content: The zero polynomial matrix over a ring represented as operation with "lifted scalars" (i.e. elements of the ring underlying the polynomial ring embedded into the polynomial ring by the scalar injection/algebraic scalars function ` algSc ` ). (Contributed by AV, 16-Nov-2019.)

thm pmat0opsc(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cfn), wcel(c1, crg)), wceq(cfv(c0g, c2), cmpo(s0, s1, c0, c0, cfv(c3, c4))))
  -| wceq(c5, cfv(cpl1, c1))
  -| wceq(c2, co(c0, cmat, c5))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(cascl, c5))
  -| wceq(c4, cfv(c0g, c1))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c5)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c5)
} = {
  eqtrd(cfv(c0g, c2), cmpo(s0, s1, c0, c0, cfv(c3, c4)), cmpo(s0, s1, c0, c0, cfv(c0g, c5)), wa(wcel(c0, cfn), wcel(c1, crg)))
  pmat0op(s0, s1, c0, c1, c2, cfv(c0g, c5), c5)
  mpt2eq3dv(s0, s1, c0, c0, cfv(c0g, c5), cfv(c3, c4), wa(wcel(c0, cfn), wcel(c1, crg)))
  adantl(wcel(c0, cfn), wcel(c1, crg), wceq(cfv(c0g, c5), cfv(c3, c4)))
  eqcomd(cfv(c0g, c5), cfv(c3, c4), wcel(c1, crg))
  ply1scl0(c1, c3, c4, cfv(c0g, c5), c5)
  eqid(cfv(c0g, c5))
  diff.wa.s(s0, wcel(c0, cfn), wcel(c1, crg))
  diff.wcel.s(s0, c0, cfn)
  diff.cfn.s(s0)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, c1, crg)
  diff.crg.s(s0)
  diff.wa.s(s1, wcel(c0, cfn), wcel(c1, crg))
  diff.wcel.s(s1, c0, cfn)
  diff.cfn.s(s1)
  diff.wcel.s(s1, c1, crg)
  diff.crg.s(s1)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm pmat0opsc(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5) {
  ⊢ ((c0 ∈ Fin ∧ c1 ∈ Ring)→(0 ` c2)=(s0 ∈ c0, s1 ∈ c0 ↦(c3 ` c4)))
  ⊣ c5 =(Poly1 ` c1)
  ⊣ c2 =(c0[Mat]c5)
  ⊣ c3 =(algSc ` c5)
  ⊣ c4 =(0 ` c1)
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c5)
  ⊣ d(s1, c0)
  ⊣ d(s1, c1)
  ⊣ d(s1, c5)
} = {
  eqtrd((0 ` c2), (s0 ∈ c0, s1 ∈ c0 ↦(c3 ` c4)), (s0 ∈ c0, s1 ∈ c0 ↦(0 ` c5)), (c0 ∈ Fin ∧ c1 ∈ Ring))
  pmat0op(s0, s1, c0, c1, c2, (0 ` c5), c5)
  mpt2eq3dv(s0, s1, c0, c0, (0 ` c5), (c3 ` c4), (c0 ∈ Fin ∧ c1 ∈ Ring))
  adantl(c0 ∈ Fin, c1 ∈ Ring, (0 ` c5)=(c3 ` c4))
  eqcomd((0 ` c5), (c3 ` c4), c1 ∈ Ring)
  ply1scl0(c1, c3, c4, (0 ` c5), c5)
  eqid((0 ` c5))
  diff.wa.s(s0, c0 ∈ Fin, c1 ∈ Ring)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, c0, cfn)
  diff.cfn.s(s0)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, c1, crg)
  diff.crg.s(s0)

blocks.name: pmat1ovscd

thm pmat1ovscd(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7, class c8, class c9, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(co(c0, c1, c2), cif(cfv(c3, c4), cfv(c3, c5), wceq(c0, c2))))
  -| wceq(c6, cfv(cpl1, c7))
  -| wceq(c8, co(c9, cmat, c6))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(cascl, c6))
  -| wceq(c5, cfv(c0g, c7))
  -| wceq(c4, cfv(cur, c7))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c9, cfn))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c7, crg))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, c9))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, c9))
  -| wceq(c1, cfv(cur, c8))
} = {
  eqtrd(co(c0, c1, c2), cif(cfv(c3, c4), cfv(c3, c5), wceq(c0, c2)), cif(cfv(cur, c6), cfv(c0g, c6), wceq(c0, c2)), w0)
  pmat1ovd(c0, c1, c2, cfv(cur, c6), cfv(c0g, c6), c6, c7, c8, c9, w0)
  ifeq12d(cfv(cur, c6), cfv(c0g, c6), cfv(c3, c4), cfv(c3, c5), w0, wceq(c0, c2))
  eqcomd(cfv(cur, c6), cfv(c3, c4), w0)
  syl(w0, wceq(cfv(c3, c4), cfv(cur, c6)), wcel(c7, crg))
  ply1scl1(c7, c3, c4, cfv(cur, c6), c6)
  eqid(cfv(cur, c6))
  eqcomd(cfv(c0g, c6), cfv(c3, c5), w0)
  syl(w0, wceq(cfv(c3, c5), cfv(c0g, c6)), wcel(c7, crg))

  eqid(cfv(c0g, c6))

thm pmat1ovscd(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7, class c8, class c9, wff w0) {

  ⊣ c6 =(Poly1 ` c7)
  ⊣ c8 =(c9[Mat]c6)

thm pmatcoe1fsupp(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6) {

  -| wceq(c5, cfv(cpl1, c1))

blocks.name: 1pmatscmul
blocks.content: The scalar product of the identity polynomial matrix with a polynomial is a polynomial matrix. (Contributed by AV, 2-Nov-2019.) (Revised by AV, 4-Dec-2019.)
blocks.origin:
thm 1pmatscmul(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7, class c8) {
  |- wi(w3a(wcel(c0, cfn), wcel(c1, crg), wcel(c2, c3)), wcel(co(c2, c4, c5), c6))
  -| wceq(c7, cfv(cpl1, c1))
  -| wceq(c8, co(c0, cmat, c7))
  -| wceq(c6, cfv(cbs, c8))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(cbs, c7))
  -| wceq(c4, cfv(cvsca, c8))
  -| wceq(c5, cfv(cur, c8))
} = {
  syl12anc(w3a(wcel(c0, cfn), wcel(c1, crg), wcel(c2, c3)), wcel(co(c2, c4, c5), c6), wa(wcel(c0, cfn), wcel(c7, crg)), wcel(c2, c3), wcel(c5, c6))
  3adant3(wcel(c0, cfn), wcel(c1, crg), wcel(c2, c3), wa(wcel(c0, cfn), wcel(c7, crg)))
  anim2i(wcel(c0, cfn), wcel(c1, crg), wcel(c7, crg))
  ply1ring(c1, c7)
  simp3(wcel(c0, cfn), wcel(c1, crg), wcel(c2, c3))
  syl(w3a(wcel(c0, cfn), wcel(c1, crg), wcel(c2, c3)), wcel(c5, c6), wcel(c8, crg))
  3adant3(wcel(c0, cfn), wcel(c1, crg), wcel(c2, c3), wcel(c8, crg))
  pmatring(c0, c1, c8, c7)
  ringidcl(c8, c5, c6)
  matvscl(c0, c7, c2, c3, c5, c6, c4, c8)
}

thm 1pmatscmul(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7, class c8) {
  ⊢ ((c0 ∈ Fin ∧ c1 ∈ Ring ∧ c2 ∈ c3)→(c2[c4]c5)∈ c6)
  ⊣ c7 =(Poly1 ` c1)
  ⊣ c8 =(c0[Mat]c7)
  ⊣ c6 =(Base ` c8)
  ⊣ c3 =(Base ` c7)
  ⊣ c4 =(× ` c8)
  ⊣ c5 =(1r ` c8)
} = {
  syl12anc((c0 ∈ Fin ∧ c1 ∈ Ring ∧ c2 ∈ c3), (c2[c4]c5)∈ c6, (c0 ∈ Fin ∧ c7 ∈ Ring), c2 ∈ c3, c5 ∈ c6)
  3adant3(c0 ∈ Fin, c1 ∈ Ring, c2 ∈ c3, (c0 ∈ Fin ∧ c7 ∈ Ring))
  anim2i(c0 ∈ Fin, c1 ∈ Ring, c7 ∈ Ring)
  ply1ring(c1, c7)
  simp3(c0 ∈ Fin, c1 ∈ Ring, c2 ∈ c3)
  syl((c0 ∈ Fin ∧ c1 ∈ Ring ∧ c2 ∈ c3), c5 ∈ c6, c8 ∈ Ring)
  3adant3(c0 ∈ Fin, c1 ∈ Ring, c2 ∈ c3, c8 ∈ Ring)
  pmatring(c0, c1, c8, c7)
  ringidcl(c8, c5, c6)
  matvscl(c0, c7, c2, c3, c5, c6, c4, c8)
}
